n: Best Spaghetti Sauce in the World
des: "Fresh and soooo tasteful, you'll love it!  Vermouth and chicken stock add depth of flavor."
ins: In a large saucepan, melt butter over low heat.  Toss in garlic and saute 1 to 2 minutes, until slightly golden.  Mix chopped tomatoes into pan. Stir in chicken stock, thinning with 1 to 2 tablespoons water if necessary.  Cook over medium heat until bubbly.  Stir in Vermouth and cook 5 minutes more.  Mix in basil just before serving.
